head.supplied: By the Highest order issued by ¶ His Royal Majesty's ¶ Chancellery of Orders. ¶ ¶ The undersigned Chancellor of His Royal Chancellery of Knightly Orders does herewith notify: that His Majesty has mos...

div.p: Decorative letterhead with inscription 'MAGNUM CAP: ORD: | S. R. DANI E.M.. SIGILLUM'. MS envelope 'Til | Herr Dr. F. Müller, | Directeur for den botaniske Have i Melbourne, | Ridder of Dannebrogsordenen' [To Dr F. Muller, Director of the botanic Garden in Melbourne, Knight of the Dannebrog Order], closed with seal. For a certified copy of this document, see CO 309/63, f400, National Archives, Kew. Efter allerhóiest Befaling udfaerdiget i

Undertegnede Cantsler for Hs. Kongelige Majestaets Ridderordener gjór herved vitterligt: at det allernaadigst har behaget Hs. Majestaet ved allerhóiest Rescript af 17de April 1863 at udnaevne Herr Dr. F. Müller, Directeur for den botaniske Have i Melbourne, til Ridder af Dannebrogsordenens 3die Klasse. —

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: By the Highest order issued by

p.style: font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva; line-height: 0.1945in; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: The undersigned Chancellor of His Royal Chancellery of Knightly Orders does herewith notify: that His Majesty has most graciously with the highest Rescript of 17 April 1863 deigned to appoint Herr Dr. F. Müller, Director to the Botanic Garden in Melbourne, to a Knight of the Dannebrog Order, 3rd class. —

Copenhagen, 23 April 1863.
It is not known who recommended M for the award, but some years earlier Sonder had been urging Johan Lange to promote it; see O. Sonder to J. Lange, 31 August 1860 (in this edition as M60-08-31).
In Melbourne, a brief announcement that M had received this award was published in Germania, 16 July 1863.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; line-height: 0.1945in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
